sqlMap.select: select VS_ID, VS_CERTIFICATION_NAME, VS_CERTIFICATION_BODY, VS_ISSUE_DATE, VS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, VS_CERTIFICATE_NO, VS_CERTIFICATION_PLACE, VS_VOCATION_SKILL_COPY, VS_REMARK, II_ID from B_VOCATION_SKILLS where VS_ID = #vsId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, c.* from ( select VS_ID, VS_CERTIFICATION_NAME, VS_CERTIFICATION_BODY, VS_ISSUE_DATE, VS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, VS_CERTIFICATE_NO, VS_CERTIFICATION_PLACE, VS_VOCATION_SKILL_COPY, VS_REMARK, II_ID from B_VOCATION_SKILLS ) c) WHERE NUMROW >= $ibegin$ AND NUMROW < $iend$

SELECT count(1) as ID from ( select VS_ID, VS_CERTIFICATION_NAME, VS_CERTIFICATION_BODY, VS_ISSUE_DATE, VS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, VS_CERTIFICATE_NO, VS_CERTIFICATION_PLACE, VS_VOCATION_SKILL_COPY, VS_REMARK, II_ID from B_VOCATION_SKILLS )
sqlMap.insert: insert into B_VOCATION_SKILLS (VS_ID, VS_CERTIFICATION_NAME, VS_CERTIFICATION_BODY, VS_ISSUE_DATE, VS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, VS_CERTIFICATE_NO, VS_CERTIFICATION_PLACE, VS_VOCATION_SKILL_COPY, VS_REMARK, II_ID) values (#vsId#, #vsCertificationName#, #vsCertificationBody#, #vsIssueDate#, #vsEffectiveDate#, #vsCertificateNo#, #vsCertificationPlace#, #vsVocationSkillCopy#, #vsRemark#, #iiId#)
sqlMap.update: update B_VOCATION_SKILLS set VS_CERTIFICATION_NAME = #vsCertificationName#, VS_CERTIFICATION_BODY = #vsCertificationBody#, VS_ISSUE_DATE = #vsIssueDate#, VS_EFFECTIVE_DATE = #vsEffectiveDate#, VS_CERTIFICATE_NO = #vsCertificateNo#, VS_CERTIFICATION_PLACE = #vsCertificationPlace#, VS_VOCATION_SKILL_COPY = #vsVocationSkillCopy#, VS_REMARK = #vsRemark#, II_ID = #iiId# where VS_ID = #vsId#
sqlMap.select:
select VS_ID, VS_CERTIFICATION_NAME, VS_CERTIFICATION_BODY, VS_ISSUE_DATE, VS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, VS_CERTIFICATE_NO, VS_CERTIFICATION_PLACE, VS_VOCATION_SKILL_COPY, VS_REMARK, II_ID from B_VOCATION_SKILLS where 1=1
II_ID = #iiId#
